title: Don Quixote in the tales of La Mancha
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Two adventures featuring Don Quixote: DON QUIXOTE AND THE FAMILY TREASURES: Don Quixote falls in love with Fidora, thinking she's his dream princess Dulsonia, but Fidora is not motivated by love, she's after the Quixote family fortune. Meanwhile with help from Sancho, Don Quixote protects Fidora from the infamous Black night: DON QUIXOTE MEETS THE WITCH QUEEN: Don's Quixote's ploy of stealing the witch queen's magic diamond to give to his dream princess backfires when the diamond is broken and witch queen Marlena wants Don Quixote to marry her. No other production details available.
